author: Sam B
comment: 3/5/18 Without a doubt the best weather app. Yes I paid for it, but you get what you pay for, we work outside and weather is everything, work or no work. Safety is paramount and weather means between life or death. 1/11/17 - Just purchased this application on the premise that the remove ads for $1.99 was the premium version evidently this is not the case,  you have to pay an additional $6.99 to receive the version for premium radar stations also. A free 30 day or even 15 days trial period would be excellent for this application. I work Outdoors and rely upon accurate weather, in fact my life sometimes even depends upon it. I will update the accuracy of this radar app later to confirm whether it's worth buying.

author: Ryan M
comment: Been using this app for years, but now the bottom 25% isn't used.  It's odd empty space.. would love full screen :(

author: Michael Garrison
comment: This app is good for those red/green colorblind. Loading has been slow or unreliable.
I have this on my pc love it have it on my cell use it a lot! Being a beginner storm watcher it helps alot!

author: Raul Ortiz
comment: The app is missing pressure information for H and L pressure systems as well as fronts.

author: rock climbing33
comment: Easy to read, easy to change locations

author: Zane M
comment: Nice app, great graphics and map layer choices. Running it side by side with other weather apps it consistently seems to be more accurate and up to date.

author: Nick Papageorgio
comment: The latest update fixes a bug in Star Citizen modes. Just give me weather, please.

author: Karen Peterson
comment: The wind layer lets you see currents worldwide and also looks really cool

author: Tigerborne
comment: Great app, if you haven't used it you should try it.

author: Robert Evans
comment: Love being able to see what's coming toward us
Love it!! The radar is my favorite

author: kathy morgan
comment: Best local radar. I use it daily.

author: Aaron Mallow Moya
comment: It's a great basic weather app

author: Bill W
comment: Used this for years now, really like it...

author: Golden Tone
comment: Great hand-held radar.
Phenomenal app!

author: Mickey Long
comment: Aok

author: jr244952
comment: Nice!

Not exactly even accurate. Plus recently it started crashing. And it has always been extremely slow. There's really nothing good going for this app. I was just trying to get on it a couple minutes ago then my phone crashed when trying to use it then it just shut down my whole phone and restarted. Yeah hell no not having an app that does this and can't even correctly use the weather radar. Wasn't gonna review it until it shut off my phone. Screw this. Uninstalled

Exactly what I was looking for, a high quality app with good detail and a smooth flow. Not grainy like other apps. Very smooth movement. I am very fussy with my weather apps and am so far more impressed with this one over the others. Installed 3/2/18 on Galaxy S7 with no issues, no lag, no crashing so far. Will update if I begin experiencing issues. Try it out.

author: Anthony Kendrick
comment: So far it has been a great app. We had 5 tornado warnings the other night and each and every time My Radar alerted me way before all the local stations and the emergency radio!!! Every second counts in situations like this!!

author: Lars Vegas
comment: Good program until the last update. Crashed my samsung note 4 multiple times. In between it made the phone lag so bad it was unusable.  Please correct the last update. Once uninstalled , note 4 worked great again.

author: Dave W
comment: This App use to be awasome, , but now after the last update it just crashes even after reinstalling. Now I'm using the best FREE system there is, my eyes.

author: Curt Niebrugge
comment: I have a suggestion from those of us who are color blind. I have a hard troubles seeing greens from yellows and some purple from blues.   I was wondering if in a future version you would be able to remove the black box around the heaviness of the rain chart? I try to move the radar to the area next to the chart at the bottom to compare the colors but the blackness of the box won't allow me to almost lay it over top each other.   It's a great app and love it, although the last version is very slow to load.   Thanks!!

author: Ragena Harnden
comment: Love this quick and easy app.  While everyone else is searching for a radar during severe weather, mine is ready to go!

author: P.J. Hartman
comment: Latest update crashes upon opening ony phone. Was working great before b

author: donald lillard
comment: The aviation overlay has stopped working so I cannot see the precipitation in relation to navaids and airspace. Very frustrating that this function has stopped working. When I select the VFR map it will not overlay. I reinstalled the app with the problem still present.

author: Jeremy Page
comment: My rating dropped from 5 to 2 because for some reason the radar showing cloud cover stopped working.. It will glitch in momentarily when zooming. Tried uninstalling it and reloading it.. Didn't work..

author: Micheal Keith
comment: With the weather in Texas this spring it has been really helpful keeping track of the storms.

author: David Armstrong
comment: I really appreciate the resolution on the humidity Maps. It makes it very easy to run here in the Pacific Northwest when I can track the incoming showers and get out in between them. This app is accurate enough to enable that.

author: David Cameron
comment: Easy to see at a glance air flow ,precipitation amounts and temperature

author: TOMAAS WILLIAMS
comment: Really love the star citizen section, but I really think you have a separate app for it.

author: Brian Tavares
comment: Oh no!!! My favorite Radar is'nt working properly since the latest up date !!! The "Clouds"no longer work !!! Please repair !!!! 3/1/18. I will wait for the Repair Up date to change this review.THANKS !!!!!
I love to watch weather systems coming and this seems to be right on...

author: robert seward
comment: Android Wear support send to be completely removed and can't seem to get an answer from the developer.

author: Karen Mayer
comment: It shows a black screen. So I guess it's not loading

author: Frank G. Sr.
comment: I think this is the best damn radar weather app out there. Surpasses all others in real time images

author: Lee Nelson
comment: I leave the optional layers on so I can see the whole picture. The viewport stays where it was opened last making it very easy to use.

author: Bob Newman
comment: I'll be standing in the rain and looking at this app and there is no rain indicated
